name: notes
description: This code is a React program where the user can enter their notes and display them on the page. The user can also delete the note once they are finished. I also used a bit of material-UI for the buttons  and the increased size of the notes. If anyone want try this code, [please click at this link](https://juliorojas81871.github.io/Notes/).

scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-client && npm run build
